description: This easy spiral pasta dish is a weeknight dinner saviour. Itâ€™s on the table in 20 minutes and has all the flavours you know and love, with a hint of chilli to give it a spicy kick. Pasta night just got better!
name: Quick Arrabiata Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/4 cup cooking liquid.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Add garlic and chilli flakes, then cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or until fragrant. Add tomatoes, increase heat to mediumhigh, and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until sauce has slightly thickened.
Tear threequarters of the basil. Add pasta, reserved cooking liquid and torn basil to pan and stir to combine. Serve sprinkled with parmesan and topped with remaining basil.
